Package it.unipd.dei.webapp.wacar.filter

Class AbstractFilter

java.lang.Object
jakarta.servlet.GenericFilter
jakarta.servlet.http.HttpFilter
it.unipd.dei.webapp.wacar.filter.AbstractFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
jakarta.servlet.Filter, jakarta.servlet.FilterConfig, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminFilter, HomeFilter, LoginFilter
public class AbstractFilter extends jakarta.servlet.http.HttpFilter
The AbstractFilter class provides a skeletal implementation of the Filter interface Extending this class allows filter implementations to focus on a more specific filtering logic
